The photo was published on May 28: 2020, in an article by BLes Mundo, a Spanish news media website.
The article: s headline translates to English as: "Repression of Hong Kong could mean the decline of the Chinese regime internationally."
The photo is credited to Twitter user: pmchau1 and has a caption that translates as: "Police assault protesters in Hong Kong."
A reverse image search on Google reveale: That Demon Within" and was published on a Yahoo movie webpage.
